revision.comment: Updated source code link to github
revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:wad2udmf}} '''wad2udmf''' is a utility written by Chris Freund to convert binary-format maps to [[UDMF]]. Its current version is 0.3.7 beta.
== External links == * {{DWForum|t=47440|Development thread}} on the Doomworld forums * [http://www.mediafire.com/download/7lt0jtd1dcrymkk/wad2udmf%200_3_7b.zip v0.3.7b] on Mediafire * [https://github.com/z34chris/Wad2UDMF Github source code]
[[Category:Map converters]][[Category:UDMF]]
